name: Animal Escape (Mea Rantala)
description:
Endless runner where you dodge different objects by jumping over or sliding under them. Super cute and super simple!

You can currently choose from 3 different animals:  

A pink Dinosaur!    

A Baby Penguin!   

  And A Red Fox! 

Our team has four members:

PRODUCER: Kasper Pylkkänen

LEAD ARTIST: Mea Rantala

PROGRAMMER: Joni Virta

ANIMATOR: Janina Sonné

*This game is supposed to be played on mobile but can be played on pc! Beware the funny mechanics!*
